subject: Text Conversion
msgSnippet: Hello All, I m in the process of building a Perl Script to convert Orthodox character text files into QuickScript ones. It will use the database that generated
messageBody:
Hello All,
 
I'm in the process of building a Perl Script to convert Orthodox character text files into QuickScript ones. It will use the database that generated the dictionary that is in the Files section. I'm currently working on the grammar/phonics rules that will try to convert works not in the database into their phonic equivalent. I think I have someone who will convert the formatted MS Word docs into Adobe PDF for me.
 
Once its done... hopefully sometime next month, I'm going to start converting some of the Gutenberg classic text pieces into QS. If anyone has any recommendations of writings they'd like to see in QS please let me know.
 
I'll update the group as I get closer to completing it.
 
 
Chuck
